pr_title: Fix #173: Use OpenShift compliant git/vcs annotations

timeline.bodyText: It would be better if the function was pure and instead of creating side effects in the input annotations variable you returned a new Map with the annotations. This map can then be appended (if applicable) to the existing variable using putAll.
timeline.author: manusa

timeline.message: Fix #173: Use OpenShift compliant git/vcs annotations

timeline.bodyText: nit: this method is not adding any annotations but generating/inferring them. Method should be named something like getAnnotations generateAnnotations inferAnnotations or sth like that.
timeline.author: manusa

timeline.bodyText: Some corner or edge cases should be tested: null method parameter values, etc.
timeline.author: manusa

timeline.message: Fix #173: Use OpenShift compliant git/vcs annotations
